## GeoBox.fromCenterAndExtents() method

Returns a `GeoBox` with the given center and dimensions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static fromCenterAndExtents(center: GeoCoordinates, extent: GeoBoxExtentLike): GeoBox;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  center | [GeoCoordinates](./harp-geoutils.geocoordinates.md) | The center position of geo box. |
|  extent | [GeoBoxExtentLike](./harp-geoutils.geoboxextentlike.md) | Box latitude and logitude span |

<b>Returns:</b>

[GeoBox](./harp-geoutils.geobox.md)
